metadata.title: CVE-2024-49865 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/xe/vm: move xa_alloc to prevent UAFEvil user can guess the next id of the vm before the ioctl completes andthen call vm destroy ioctl to trigger UAF since create ioctl is stillreferencing the same vm. Move the xa_alloc all the way to the end toprevent this.v2: - Rebase(cherry picked from commit dcfd3971327f3ee92765154baebbaece833d3ca9)
